replies.msg:
First half of the statement is a perfect portrait of the situation. Hkers always criticise others licking the CCP’s ass for money like FUCK OFF JAMES. But they are just the same excluding those 3000 ppl in Charter Gardner the other night.

Police brutality, suppression of political freedom and freedom of speech are universal values, which all of us should stand for.

Hk protesters always say ‘ "Between a high, solid wall and an egg that breaks against it, I will always stand on the side of the egg." But this time they all became the high and solid wall for the sake of the US support. But the fact is the US will stand with HK unless we are asking for independence as HK is a very valuable bargaining chip for them against China.

Those 3000 ppl are the only hope of Hong Kong for now, I believe more and more ppl will improve and grow just like how we improved from 2014 to 2016 and now. They just need time, especially this time many of the protestors are youngsters that lacks political knowledge.


Personally, I will not attend any activities in the near future since I think what I’m fighting for is different with the HK general public. But don’t lose hope, have faith in HKer’s capability to fight.
¢50 you treat Catalonian as a convenient condom as well
Pull
